basics.name: Andres Otarola Alvarado
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary:
I'm a software engineer with +12 years of experience, passionate about technology, web development, and functional programming.

Throughout my career; I had the opportunity to grow at Groupon by building and managing web applications and architected platform-level solutions. I have worked with product and platform teams with a strong front-end focus.

Currently, I'm looking for a remote frontend role (I'm flexible on a hybrid remote position as well).

My ideal team is one with highly skilled individuals looking to keep improving and helping each other.

work.name: Groupon (US)
work.summary: Member of the Web Core Team
highlights: Architected and implemented Optimizely A/B testing service Web integration
Supported teams to migrate on-prem services onto AWS
Built internal web application to visualize and validate experiments on Optimizely. Elm was used in this project
Led platform-level communications to feature teams every week

work.name: Groupon (US)
work.summary: Checkout Web team's tech lead (login/signup, checkout, receipt, and my account pages)
highlights: Architected and led web and mobile integration with 3DS2.0
Refactored login/signup web application, improving page load by 20%, thus making it meet business performance goals. Since the page was simple, just Vanilla JS was used to keep it light
Drove Apple Pay and Paypal implementation into checkout page
Implemented Payment Request API along with Google Team onto checkout page.

work.name: Groupon (US)
work.summary: Checkout Web team's tech lead (login/signup, checkout, receipt, and my account pages)
highlights: UX overhaul confirmation and receipt page, whole CSS and JS was remade, improving page load by 30%
Led redesign project for touch experience on the confirmation page. Replaced JQuery code with preact and removed unneeded CSS, improving page load by 60%
Migrated our test suite from PhantomJS to headless chrome via TestiumJS, improving CI pass by 80%
Built and led magic link feature for login page
Migrated logging searches from Splunk to ELK, which contributed to the overall cost reduction usage of third party services
Integrated ELK searches into Wavefront.

work.name: Groupon (Chile)
highlights: Migrated the checkout page US from monolithic Ruby on Rails application to in-house NodeJS framework
Migrated the checkout page EMEA from custom Java framework to in-house NodeJS framework
Added multi-item order support onto existing orders API (Ruby on Rails)

work.name: Groupon (Chile)
work.summary: Groupon Sales Team (Groupon web application specific for Chile)
highlights: Implemented Geolocalization services for shipping delivery services
Led IP warm-up on Sendgrid, allowing us to
Improved script used for massive email sending (newsletters), reducing it from 4 hours run to under 10 minutes, the script was done in PHP
Built a web application that allowed for marketing campaign creation, eliminating manual work. The Web application was created with CakePHP and MySQL.

volunteer.summary: Taught basic Web development to high school students.
